Dr Raphael Sonabend-Friend is a Director and Founder of OSPO Now.

Raphael oversees all work at OSPO Now as well as working on our strategy and growth.

Alongside OSPO Now, Raphael works as a Scientific Advisor at the National Institute of Care and Excellence (NICE), working on implementing large language models to accelerate internal processes.
Prior to founding OSPO Now, Raphael worked at Genomics England developing an Open Source community for tools to enhance genomic equity.
Before Genomics England, they worked at the Wellcome Trust, focused on funding high-impact open source, data science projects for tackling urgent global health problems.
